name: Secrets of the Bering Sea
description:
During the filming of Season 17 of Deadliest Catch, 3 fishing boats became trapped by a sudden storm in the heart of the Bering sea. Attempts at communicating with the boats were futile, as if they had fallen off the face of the earth. Before the coast guard could put together a search and rescue mission, a boat bearing the sigil of the fierce lion was spotted speeding away from Dutch harbor, headed straight into the storm.

Play as the Captain of the Fierce Lion as he faces off against every crab in the Bering Sea in this thrilling third person shooter!

Big thanks to Alexander "Big Al" Conger for the OST and Fierce Lion Vlogs for the inspiration.

Update 1.0.1

- Made a goof where the final level was only 2 rounds. Now it's fixed.

Update 1.1

- Added volume control, however it is still recommended to play at the loudest volume for maximum immersion. 

- Patched some of the nonsense and tweaked some of the bullshit.
